snippet: The two patients were being treated for respiratory ailments in a hospital last month when they had contact with the nation’s first MERS patient.
abstract: South Korea confirms deaths of two people from Middle East Respiratory Syndrome; 25 cases of virus have been found in country, mostly among hospital staff, patients and visitors, and over 680 people have been isolated.
lead_paragraph: The two patients were being treated for respiratory ailments in a hospital last month when they had contact with the nation’s first MERS patient.

headline.main: South Korea: 2 Die of MERS Virus
headline.print_headline: Asia; South Korea: 2 Die of MERS Virus
